title: Daily Change
content:
This indicator shows the price change at present, in relation to the current day opening or yesterday's closing, depending on selected settings.

To add and set up the indicator, open the Indicators settings window.


Indicator's settings

Colors

NameDescription
Buy Color Displays the color of an element with a positive value.
Background buy color Sets the background color of the label.
Sell Color Displays the color of an element with a negative value.
Background sell color Sets the background color of the label.

Common

NameDescription
Calculation Mode Calculation Mode of the Indicator

Options:
  • Current day open
  • Previous day close
Text Location Specifies the display location of the label.

Options:
  • Top left
  • Top right
  • Bottom left
  • Bottom right
Type Allows the user to select the data source for calculating the indicator. It can be specific candlestick prices like open, close, etc., or another indicator

Options:
  • Percent
  • Ticks
  • Price change
Font Size Sets the font size.
